flavorText:
"Overkill? This isn't a game of Kick-the-Ouphe!"
—Jaya Ballard, task mage
name: Lava Burst
originalText: Lava Burst deals X damage to target creature or player. If Lava Burst would deal damage to a creature, that damage can't be prevented or dealt instead to another creature or player.

rulings.text: Prevention and redirection effects will have no effect on damage dealt by Lava Burst to a creature. However, they will work on damage that Lava Burst would deal to a player.
A creature dealt damage by Lava Burst may be regenerated.

text: Lava Burst deals X damage to any target. If Lava Burst would deal damage to a creature, that damage can't be prevented or dealt instead to another permanent or player.
